scripts.compile: browserify main.js -o bundled/compiled_main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-async-to-generator ] ]
scripts.compile-test: browserify spec/RPSAppSpec.js -o bundled/compiledSpec.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-async-to-generator ] ]
